name: The Circle of Life-Defense
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 44

This is a small sandbox tower defense game where you must repel swarms of festering zombies, rotten flesh vying to consume your very being, with naught but your very own blood, sweat, and tears. Use your life shards to construct venerable defense towers, but be weary, building towers can hurt you as well!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Left Click to build a tower (cost 1 life shard)
  • Left Click on a fully healed tower to upgrade it (cost 1 life shard)
  • Left Click on a damaged tower to heal it and boost it's health (cost 1 life shard)
  • Left Click on nearby blocks to pick them up and place them
  • Right Click on a tower to destroy it

CRITICS ARE RAVING ABOUT THIS CRITICALLY ACLAIMED ADVENTURE!
